word: The psalmist says, \93Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me.\94 But in the midst of the words of gratitude is heard a discordant note. \93And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation, because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day.\94 He was indignant that Christ had caused an unhappy woman to sound a note of joy upon the Sabbath. In a loud voice, harsh with passion, he said to the people, \93There are six days in which men ought to work; in them therefore come and be healed, and not on the sabbath day.\94
